alert.note: Alert for Alleghany; Ashe; Stokes; Surry; Yadkin (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 03 at 5:22PM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...Showers and isolated thunderstorms, capable of producing gusty winds, will impact portions of western Stokes County in north central North Carolina, northern Ashe, northeastern Yadkin, Alleghany and Surry Counties in northwestern North Carolina, southern Pulaski, Smyth, southwestern Floyd, Carroll, Wythe, Grayson and Patrick Counties in southwestern Virginia and the City of Galax through 545 PM EST... At 519 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking showers, as well as clusters of isolated thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Mountain City to Bottom to near Pilot Mountain State Park. Movement was north at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mount Airy... Wytheville... Galax... Marion... Flat Rock... Hillsville... and Chilhowie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Additional statements will be issued as conditions warrant.
